title: Kezia's Crucifixion
description: In a city full of crime, violence and corruption, a young woman disappears. Her mother was a prostitute. Her best friend is an ecstasy dealer. Her cousin is a violent hooligan and shady businessman. There are many grim possibilities as to what could have happened to Kezia Ashcroft.When Simon Kershaw, a brilliant yet troubled probation officer learns of Kezia's disappearance, he decides to investigate knowing that no one else will. Yet with only the three words: "MHC", "JASPER" and "DONEGAL" to guide him, Simon must race against time while battling his own demons to find Kezia before it is too late.From the intriguing prologue and head-scratching mystery, to the pulse-pounding action and heart-wrenching conclusion, Kezia's Crucifixion is a novel unlike anything which came before it. A blistering debut thriller, perfect for fans of True Detective and The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo.
author: M.G. Wallace
